mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, replyer = #{replyer}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updatedate from (select /*+INDEX(tbl_reply idx_reply) */ rownum rn, a.* from tbl_reply a where bno = #{bno} and rno > 0 and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
